title: Gather Post-Training Feedback
description: After a training session, the consultant sends out a feedback survey to attendees.

tasks.description: Create a feedback survey with questions about the trainer, content, and overall experience.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant prepares a relevant feedback survey.

tasks.description: Email the survey link to all training attendees.
Analyze the survey results and summarize the findings to improve future training sessions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant uses the feedback to make tangible improvements.
